title: adding account manually
content: In the newest release of Thunderbird 143.0.1, there is no way to add a mail account manually. You have done something in the newest version that does not match any of your online helps. Please tell me the secret process that matches what I see as I use the new release
creator: airmorris9

title: Merging duplicates in address book
content: How can I merge duplicate contacts in Address Book?
creator: janeandstevep

title: Sent items don't show in 'sent folder'
content:
Since awhile while, the items I send, don';t show up in the sent folder of that account. The complete folder is empty, which means that I also lost messages. I didn't make any changes to the settings, it might have happened due to an update maybe?

My other accounts work still fine. I checked all settings I could think of that might affect it, but haven't found a solution. I'm getting pretty desperate and hope someone can help me out.

It's an IMAP account. I've selected the 'sent folder' in subscribed. 'When sending messages, automatically' the 'place a copy in' is checked and directed to the email address. Also tried it with checking 'other' and select email address. I also just tried to 'local folder', but nothing happens.

I hope my description is fine. If more info is needed to tackle this problem, I like to hear!
creator: info13041

title: Thunderbirdportable lost all data after updrading to 140.3
